subject: HELLO,WE HAVE BEEN WAITING
body: HELLO,WE HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THE PAYMENT RECEIPT.

subject: Re:    HELLO,WE HAVE BEEN WAITING
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I apologize for the delay. I will make the payment as soon as possible and send you the receipt.

Best Regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Kelly
